name: Golem Core
description:
Avoid debris and trap plates while trying to get to the tower and deactivate it!  

Sneak through the level using the provided walls to avoid the tower.  If you're spotted make sure to put a wall between you and the tower or it's over for you.  Get to the tower and deactivate it and you win.

My submission for the GDFG's Montly Game Jam in January.

Still very much a prototype, given it was put together in a month and it's my first game of my own design.  

Aside from what the game tells you:

The Debris is represented by 3 flat circles on the ground, if you run over these you will make a noise and the tower will be alerted to your presence.

The Trap Plates are represented by red squares on the ground.  Stepping on one will either generate more Debris or speed up the rate at which the tower searches and fires.  Definitely avoid these, they'll make your life significantly harder.

Admittedly there isn't much to it but I hope people enjoy at least a little bit all the same.
